name: War For Galaxy
description:
War For Galaxy is an exciting and addictive game about space! Get a foothold on the planet, create a defense and a fleet! Attack and defend. You have to fight with players in real time.

FEATURES OF THE ONLINE GAME:
- Real-time space strategy with 3D graphics.
- Multiplayer strategy in Russian.
- Regular updates: military equipment and weapons, heroes, new missions.
- The ability to conquer space, create colonies, distribute resources.
- Develop deposits and produce resources.
- Build production facilities and design spaceships.
- Exploration of unknown corners of the galaxy.
- Fight with your neighbors! And also go hiking in other galaxies.

Try to start playing!
